abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of: (1)
            construction and upgrading of five highways linking major
            cities or important industrial or agricultural areas (612
            km); (2) consulting services to assist DNER to improve its
            supervision of construction, including supervision of works
            in (1) above; (3) highway maintenance programs in the states
            of Minas Gerais and Rio Grande do Sul; (4) strengthening of
            DNER's highway maintenance capability by technical
            assistance and by the provision and installation of weigh
            bridges and federal highways; and (5) consulting services
            for feasibility studies and detailed engineering for
            construction and reconstruction of roads.
